## buildPrompt

Builds the prompt string to send to the Gemini API.

### Parameters

*   `params` **[Object][1]** The parameters for building the prompt.

    *   `params.relationship` **[Object][1]** The relationship object for the user triggering the reply.
    *   `params.context` **[Array][2]<[Object][1]>** The recent message history for the channel.
    *   `params.guildRelationships` **[Object][1]** A map of all user relationships in the guild. (optional, default `{}`)
    *   `params.guildName` **[string][3]** The name of the guild. (optional, default `''`)
    *   `params.userMessage` **[string][3]** The content of the user's message.
    *   `params.username` **[string][3]** The username of the user triggering the reply.

Returns **[string][3]** The constructed prompt string.

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object

[2]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array

[3]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String
